predictions.text: USD/JPY spot will trade at or above 152.00 at least once by 2025-09-20 (UTC).
predictions.verification_criteria: Any reputable FX data source (Bloomberg, Refinitiv, ICE/TradingView) shows intraday USD/JPY high >= 152.00 before 2025-09-20 23:59:59 UTC.
monitoring_signals: BOJ policy commentary and JGB purchase operations
predictions.rationale: BOJ normalization remains tentative while US yields stay elevated; rising policy risk premia and data-dependent Fed path support USD strength.

predictions.text: U.S. PPI Final Demand m/m (seasonally adjusted) for August 2025 will print between 0.1% and 0.4%.
predictions.verification_criteria: BLS news release for Producer Price Index shows the August 2025 Final Demand m/m SA change >= 0.1% and <= 0.4%.
monitoring_signals: Freight spot rates and supply chain indicators
predictions.rationale: Goods disinflation persists and services pressures are moderating; energy base effects are contained, pointing to a modest PPI print.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-22 close to 2025-09-27 close, XLP will outperform XLY by at least 3.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted close prices (e.g., Yahoo Finance/Bloomberg), compute total return % from 2025-08-22 close to 2025-09-27 close for XLP and XLY; (XLP_return − XLY_return) >= 3.0 pp.
predictions.rationale: Consumers are trading down; staples defensiveness and pricing power should beat discretionary amid margin and demand pressure.

predictions.text: The U.S. 10-year Treasury yield (constant maturity) will close at or above 4.45% on at least one trading day by 2025-09-20.
predictions.verification_criteria: U.S. Treasury Daily Treasury Yield Curve Rates (series DGS10) shows any close >= 4.45% on or before 2025-09-20.
monitoring_signals: FOMC communications and rate path probability
predictions.rationale: Policy uncertainty and Treasury supply can lift term premium; a cautious Fed path keeps long rates elevated.

predictions.text: By 2025-09-30, at least one of TP-Link, Netgear, Asus, or Ubiquiti will publish a firmware update or security advisory explicitly addressing the August 2025 Dnsmasq cache-poisoning CVE.
predictions.verification_criteria: A vendor advisory or firmware release notes on the official site for TP-Link, Netgear, Asus, or Ubiquiti that names the August 2025 Dnsmasq CVE and indicates a fix/mitigation, dated on or before 2025-09-30.
evidence: Dnsmasq cache-poisoning CVE assigned August 2025 (industry disclosures)
predictions.rationale: Vulnerability severity and broad device exposure make vendor advisories likely after distro fixes emerge.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-22 close to 2025-09-30 close, Alphabet (GOOGL) will outperform Microsoft (MSFT) by at least 2.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted close prices (e.g., Nasdaq/Yahoo Finance), compute total returns for GOOGL and MSFT from 2025-08-22 close to 2025-09-30 close; (GOOGL_return − MSFT_return) >= 2.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: AI infra capex guidance from large platforms
predictions.rationale: A headline GCP win and competitive momentum can shift relative sentiment toward Alphabet versus Azure-heavy Microsoft near term.

predictions.text: From 2025-08-22 close to 2025-09-30 close, Tesla (TSLA) will underperform QQQ by at least 4.0 percentage points based on adjusted close prices.
predictions.verification_criteria: Using adjusted close prices (e.g., Nasdaq/Yahoo Finance), compute total returns from 2025-08-22 close to 2025-09-30 close; (TSLA_return − QQQ_return) <= −4.0 pp.
monitoring_signals: EV incentives and competitive pricing in China/EU
Interest rate moves and credit conditions
predictions.rationale: Regulatory overhang and pricing pressure amid a competitive EV backdrop can weigh on TSLA relative to broad tech.
